payments_info.title: Flexible Payment Options
payments_info.description: At Kyaw Kyar, you can purchase with <highlight>Cash Payment</highlight>, or choose easy <highlight>Showroom Installment</highlight> or low-interest <highlight>Bank Installment</highlight> plans.
payments_info.showroom_details: If you choose showroom installment for {{duration}} months duration, you pay {{initialPayment}}% as initial deposit, and {{paperworkFee}}% of car price for paperwork fee. Then you have to give {{interestRate}}% interest rate on the remaining {{remainingPct}}%.

purchase_guide.title: Required Documents for Bank Installment
purchase_guide.subtitle: Please bring the following documents for processing.
purchase_guide.bank_approval_note: * The installment process can only proceed after receiving Bank Approval.
